issue.title: [Rust] Add Slice to Array and ArrayData
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3954](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3954). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similar to C++, we should be able to construct zero-copy slice from `Array` and `ArrayData`.
